summary: When a respectable middle-class couple take a cross-country trip by auto, they share expenses with a decidedly oddball couple, none of whom know the car carries embezzled funds.
cast: Charles Ruggles|Mary Boland|W.C. Fields|George Burns|Gracie Allen|Alison Skipworth|Bradley Page|Grace Bradley|William J. Kelly|Phil Tead|William Augustin|Irving Bacon|Harry Bernard|James Burke|Kathleen Burke|Neal Burns|Phil Dunham|Florence Enright|Martin Faust|Verna Hillie|Alfred P. James|Lew Kelly|Walter Long|Sam Lufkin|Robert McKenzie|Pat O'Malley|George C. Pearce|Lee Phelps|Dick Rush|Leo Willis|Tammany Young
title: Viaje de placer
